02-62- 1522
May Li, 2
MEMORANDUM
To
: Fr. R. L. Hirshberg Program Officer, US AID/C
From
: C. C. Chang Original signed by Chief, Second Division C. C. Chang
Subject : Excess Equipment Project No. 1-99-AX (19-471)
Reference is made to the attached copy of MO letter No. 9-153 dated May 11, 1962.
In the above letter, TPC requested that steel drill bits be procured. If you concur and they are available, please initiate necessary action for acquisition and shipment to faire ..
incl. copy of TPC letter
